DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the potential of dapsone gel and its vehicle to cause a photoallergic reaction after repeated application and irradiation to the skin of healthy volunteers under controlled conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Photoallergy Potential of Dapsone Gel in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adults. Skin diseases, excessive hair, tattoos, pigmentation, scars or moles that could interfere with patch application Sensitivity to adhesive bandages or tape.
